messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] research help needed
messages.msgSnippet: http://tinyurl.com/ptfxz ... From: bungotakadasword To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, September 24, 2006 4:14 PM Subject: [nihontostudy] research
messages.messageBody:
http://tinyurl.com/ptfxz


----- Original Message -----
From: bungotakadasword
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, September 24, 2006 4:14 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] research help needed


gang,
I am planning on writing an article on hawk paintings for the Jss/us.
The artist in question is Tamura Chokuo (circa early 17th cent ) of
the Soga school.
There are not too many resources on this guy in English.........may
be our fellow members in Japan can help me with any info gleamed from
the Japanese text ?
Chokuo was known as a pupil of Soga Chokuan ( only 9 works by Chokuan
are known ). The other well known Soga artist is Nichokuan.

For a sample of his signature and seal........... please klick the
following link.

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?
ViewItem&category=38125&item=160022642434

bottom left pic

mucha gracias

milt





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
